SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, communication_protocol, ipv4, ipv6, communication_path, device_status, manufacturer, location, parent_device_id
FROM tb_device
WHERE device_id LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" AND (parent_device_id = '' OR parent_device_id = null)
WHERE parent_device_id = '' OR parent_device_id = null
LIMIT #{start}, #{count}

SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, communication_protocol, ipv4, ipv6, communication_path, device_status, manufacturer, location, parent_device_id
FROM tb_device WHERE device_id in ( SELECT child_device_id FROM tb_device_child WHERE parent_device_id = #{parentId} )
